homePageWelcomeMessage: Welcome to Oromia Education Research and Training Center
siteName: Oromia Education Research and Training Center
tagline: Your ideal partner for education and training stays and events.
languagesSupported: Available in English, Afan Oromo, and Amharic.
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code below to view or download our digital brochure for more details about our center, services, and facilities.
scanForBrochureDesc: Use your phone camera or a QR code scanner.
faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and booking process.
faqQ1Title: How do I book a dormitory room?
faqQ1Answer: You can book a dormitory room by visiting our 'Dormitories' page, selecting an available room for your desired dates, and filling out the booking form. Payment is typically made via bank transfer, and proof of payment needs to be submitted via Telegram.
faqQ2Title: How do companies book halls or sections?
faqQ2Answer: Companies must first register through the 'Register Company' link. Once approved by an admin, company representatives can log in to book halls or sections, select services like catering, and will receive an agreement to sign.
faqQ3Title: What payment methods are accepted for dormitory bookings?
faqQ3Answer: For dormitory bookings, we primarily accept direct bank transfers to the center's account. After making the transfer, you will need to send a screenshot of the transaction proof via our Telegram bot for verification.
faqQ4Title: What are the check-in and check-out times for dormitories?
faqQ4Answer: Standard check-in time is 2:00 PM and check-out is 12:00 PM. For specific arrangements, please contact the respective building administrators.
faqQ5Title: Can I cancel or modify my booking?
faqQ5Answer: For modifications or cancellations, please contact our administration office directly. Policies may vary depending on the type of booking and how far in advance the request is made.
faqQ6Answer: Yes, we offer ample parking space for guests and event attendees within the center's premises.
faqQ7Title: Is Wi-Fi available at the center?
faqQ7Answer: Yes, complimentary Wi-Fi access is available in most areas of our center, including common areas and halls.
